sections.heading: of act.The Model Act Regarding Use of Credit Information in Personal Insurance applies to personal insurance policies either written to be effective or renewed on or after nine months after August 31, 2003

sections.text:
44-7712.Applicability of act.

The Model Act Regarding Use of Credit Information in Personal Insurance applies to personal insurance policies either written to be effective or renewed on or after nine months after August 31, 2003.

SourceLaws 2003, LB 487, ยง 12.
